areas.description:
Select the zones to monitor for arming status.

On most panels you will use '01' when arming home (perimeter zone) and '02' or '03' for away (interior zone).

When you arm the panel home from Home Assistant we will arm the zone you specify below, however, when you diarm or arm away this will effect all zones.
